result.arabic_text: فَفِرُّوٓاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِۖ إِنِّي لَكُم مِّنۡهُ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٞ
result.translation: (50) So flee to Allāh.[1546] Indeed, I am to you from Him a clear warner.
result.footnotes: [1546]- i.e., turn to Allāh and take refuge in Him from disbelief and sin, thereby escaping His punishment.
